title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 1 Scholar Program builds a strong academic base by covering the entire school curriculum, along with all classwork, homework, assignments, and tests. Your child strengthens reading, writing, mathematical reasoning, and environmental awareness — while developing creativity, discipline, and expression through structured daily engagement.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Mathematics, EVS, GK, Moral Values, Art & Craft, Storytelling, and Cognitive Development.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Complete support for school syllabus, projects, and academic assessments
- Weekly academic modules designed with creative and critical thinking tasks
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard to track concept mastery and behavior
- Merit Badges in creativity, reading, discipline, and improvement
- Prepares children to confidently transition into advanced academic formats

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
In Class 1, CodeVoyagers helps children develop a deeper understanding of logical thinking, directions, algorithms, and creative digital activities. Learners solve real-world problems using storytelling logic, board-based commands, and early digital interaction — forming a natural transition into future programming.

This is where structured pre-coding becomes purposeful and fun.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Early introduction to computational concepts like step-by-step logic, commands, and patterns
- Hands-on kits with screen-light activities and visual logic challenges
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault with daily puzzles and sequencing games
- Parent+Child Dashboard showing growth in logical and creative thinking
- Prepares your child for early coding platforms and problem-solving activities

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 1 communication journey focuses on developing spoken fluency, correct accent, stage confidence, and structured writing. Learners engage in storytelling, picture talk, reading comprehension, and public speaking formats to build both expressive and academic English.

The program also introduces children to multilingual sound patterns to enhance language flexibility and listening skills.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Emphasis on spoken English, listening comprehension, accent clarity, and stage readiness
- Show-and-tell, poetry recitation, short speeches, and dialogue practice
- Writing support: sentence building, punctuation, picture description, grammar starters
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! video speech activities for fluency and feedback
- Optional multi-language training - may it be French, German, or any other
- Develops confident communicators with strong academic and social expression

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
MathMagicians’ Lab for Class 1 blends everyday math logic with foundational concepts from the school curriculum. Children explore numbers, measurements, shapes, patterns, and word problems through interactive kits and visual problem-solving tools.

The program helps your child see the “why” behind math — not just the “how.”

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Topics include number operations, time, money, data, measurements, and patterns
- Real-world math applications: shopping, cooking, travel, and daily routines
- Brain Gym activities for improving speed, logic, and critical reasoning
- Merit Badges for applied math, accuracy, and logical approach
- Builds deep math fluency, curiosity, and confidence in solving real problems
